name: SummonJarvis
0:
”Alexa Summon Jarvis”
”Jarvis how can I use A.I. in my work”
”Jarvis tell me a story about an astronaut discovering aliens living on the moon”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: summon jarvis
des: Meet Jarvis, your trusted AI companion for engaging conversations and advanced problem-solving, available right on your Alexa device. Jarvis is here to be your virtual confidant and problem-solving partner, ready to assist with a wide range of topics and questions. With Jarvis, you can immerse yourself in interactive dialogues, explore information, and enjoy the benefits of voice-activated AI technology. The information generated by this skill is sourced from OpenAI's ChatGPT and is intended for entertainment purposes only. Please refer to OpenAI's website for information about ChatGPT and it's content. Say hello to Jarvis and experience the future of voice-based AI interaction today!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
